posts.content: If you can still get ya hands on a big one then i'm wel up for that!

I'm going to pick up 2 more large ones this afternoon. That'll be 3 large and 1 small. Erna has requested a large, shaggy66bus is to get back to me but if I don't hear will get a large, and then the large and small are going to Dom. I think I can squeeze that lot into my case so I will have to leave it at that and sort out further requests when I come back or with Carlos who is coming out later in the year.

Sorry to let some of you down, I am just running out of time and space in my case!

James

OK, went to the same shop but no more large ones in stock. Then had a tuk-tuk tour of the back streets of Aurangabad, looking for alternative suppliers and the 3rd place we found had some in a slightly different style. Afraid no chrome on the rim of these, but they are metal so probably possible to get them chromed if required. Bonus is that these two cost about Â£2.50 each!

Will sort out shipping and paying when I get back to the UK.

So long for now!

James
well done james.

Hi all,

Sorry to go quiet for a while - was a bit hectic when I got back from India and then had a week of sailing on the Broads last week so not had a chance to sort out these headlights. Will pm those for whom I managed to get them the details, will try to work out how to get more back for those who I couldn't get them for this time.

Cheers,

James
You were on the broads!, awww - you could have dropped one round my house

i thought you had got lost james.
if your doing action i can pick up there
If anyone is on and has Erna or Shaggy66bus' numbers, can you call them and if they're at Breeze get them to ring me on 07779594191. Thanks! James

Severely late thread resurrection...

OK, so I didn't get these out when I bought them back from India, completely lost track and didn't hear from Erna or Shaggy66bus. Anyway, having just moved house for the third time since last posting here, I found the lights etc and was wondering if anyone is interested in them now? Not really interested in any money for these as I wrote off the nominal cost some years ago. First dibs to Erna and Shaggy, if they are still around. Currently located in Brighton area, hope someone can make use of them!

Cheers,

James
I may be interested...... have you had confirmation that they fit the roof contours?

Hi James, I'll willingly pay any costs you've spent out, and a bit of beer money , if you still have one available, preferably large.
Frank.

If you have one still available I would be more than happy to pay/make donation and pay postage

Please keep mr in mind

Regards rod
